Hi I’m Will

Empathetic design
for better experiences

Projects Contact

I research, prototype, and design for digital products. I make things that solve problems by understanding people and relationships.

Currently I design prototypes for websites at SapientNitro for clients like Panera Bread and AlzForum.org. In my free time, I study mindfulness meditation, learn to code my ideas, and practice the Bacon Method.

Recently I taught Interaction Design at Massachusetts College of Art and Design GDC Program and presented “UX Tools of the Trade” at the UXPA 2013 Boston Conference.

Previously I graduated from Massachusetts College of Art and Design's Graphic Design BFA, during which I had three internships, including at Mullen.

Photo by Jeremiah Louf 2012
